text: Sinaamey Yalla kinni sin abba Aadam burtak gintem, lakal daacoyti tiffak kay samad gine, lakal dabloytak sin gine, lakal inâ baguk galaluh (alqih) anuk sin yayyaaqe, lakal maqar-le furrayniino guftaanam keh, lakal idoolá takkeenim keh kaadu Yalli wohuk naharat siinik qidam tanih kaadu muggaqsime waktiy qumri siinik gaba edde kala taafeeniih wohul kaskassoowa mara takkeenî gidah
